title: S Health (works on all samsung devices running official android
description:
S Health is a signature application released mainly fo the Galaxy S4 and the Note 3 both of them being a flagship device of the Samsung Electronics 

 THIS APP allows users to watch their weight, blood pressure, and blood sugar levels from their phone. First announced at the Galaxy S III's unveiling back in May, the app syncs with blood pressure monitors and blood glucose meters from Lifescan, Omron, and A&D over Bluetooth or USB depending on the device.
 
S Health stores readings from these devices so the user can view them over time and share them with contacts or social networks. The idea is to provide a framework for users to set goals and track their progress. S Health is launching in the US, South Korea, and five European countries, and can be downloaded either from the Samsung Apps store or More Services link on the Galaxy S III.

Those of you who are unable to get the app on Samsung APPS they can try this torrent.

Instructions to install-
When the torrent starts seeding just install it on your device normally.
If the installation is blocked due to security reasons on your samsung device then go to settings>>security>>device administration>>and leave the installation from unknown sources ticked.
Note:This app is not tested on NON SAMSUNG DEVICES ,SO PLS TEST AND LEAVE A COMMENT FOR THE SAME IF OR NOT IT WORKS ON ANY NON SAMSUNG DEVICES.
ALSO FEEL FREE TO ASK ANY QUERIES THROUGH YOUR COMMENTS.
